On routines

I‚Äôm still figuring out my relationship to routines, and I suspect I will be forever. I‚Äôve always loved the idea of having the perfect morning or nighttime routine, but routines are hard to force. I‚Äôm awful at routines, awful at keeping habits, awful at following through with any sort of consistency. This means I‚Äôm sort of awful at taking care of myself outside of the necessities.
